title: Read the resignation letter of national security advisor Michael Flynn - Documents - Los Angeles Times
text:
Read the resignation letter of national security advisor Michael Flynn Feb. 13, 2017 
Mi­chael Flynn resigned as Pres­id­ent Trump’s na­tion­al se­cur­ity ad­visor, the White House said, fol­low­ing mount­ing scru­tiny over his con­flict­ing ac­counts of con­tacts with a Rus­si­an dip­lo­mat and re­ports that they were part of a fed­er­al in­vest­ig­a­tion. Related
